alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Muskogee; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 2:25PM CDT until April 20 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Haskell County in southeastern Oklahoma... Central Sequoyah County in east central Oklahoma... Southeastern Muskogee County in east central Oklahoma... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 225 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of Porum, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations in or near the path include... Sallisaw... Stigler... Vian... Porum... Marble City... Tamaha... Brushy Lake State Park... Brushy... Briartown... Mc Key... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 287 and 311. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
